name: B. Fedor and New Game
statement:
After you had helped George and Alex to move in the dorm, they went to
help their friend Fedor play a new computer game Call of Soldiers 3 .The
game has players and types of soldiers in total. Players Call of
Soldiers 3 are numbered form to . Types of soldiers are numbered from to
. Each player has an army. Army of the -th player can be described by
non-negative integer . Consider binary representation of : if the -th
bit of number equal to one, then the army of the -th player has soldiers
of the -th type. Fedor is the -th player of the game. He assume that two
players can become friends if their armies differ in at most types of
soldiers (in other words, binary representations of the corresponding
numbers differ in at most bits). Help Fedor and count how many players
can become his friends.
